Test.Name: BenabledDocument
Test.Description: check whether the document uses the deprecated 'B-index'

Test.Name: SamePixeltypePerChannel
Test.Description: check that the subblocks of a channel have the same pixeltype

Test.Name: PlanesIndicesStartAtZero
Test.Description: Check that planes indices start at 0

Test.Name: PlaneIndicesAreConsecutive
Test.Description: Check that planes have consecutive indices

Test.Name: SubblocksHaveMindex
Test.Description: check if all subblocks have the M index

Test.Name: BasicMetadataValidation
Test.Description: Basic semantic checks of the XML-metadata

Finding.Description: For the following dimensions the start/size given in metadata differs from document statistics: Z

Test.Name: CCheckOverlappingScenesOnLayer0
Test.Description: check if subblocks at pyramid-layer 0 of different scenes are overlapping

Finding.Description: in plane Z0C0 there are overlapping subblocks in scene 0 and scene 1
Finding.Details: The following subblocks overlap (1st is scene#0, 2nd is scene#1): (0<->1)

Finding.Description: in plane Z1C0 there are overlapping subblocks in scene 0 and scene 1
Finding.Details: The following subblocks overlap (1st is scene#0, 2nd is scene#1): (4<->5)

Finding.Description: in plane Z0C1 there are overlapping subblocks in scene 0 and scene 1
Finding.Details: The following subblocks overlap (1st is scene#0, 2nd is scene#1): (2<->3)

Finding.Description: in plane Z1C1 there are overlapping subblocks in scene 0 and scene 1
Finding.Details: The following subblocks overlap (1st is scene#0, 2nd is scene#1): (6<->7)

Test.Name: CheckSubBlockBitmapValid
Test.Description: SubBlock-Segments in SubBlockDirectory are valid and valid content
